divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I saw it at around 8:40 stopping for about 10 seconds. I cannot make out its shape due to the darkness, but think its oval from the 4 lights around it. 2 of these lights flashes in different colors and it emits a weird "LOOOOO" sound.
